name: The Rotten Pumpkin
description:
Story:

As you try to reclaim the land which should belong to the nature , pesky knights in their matching golden uniforms try to "defend" whats theirs, organise your buddies and show them who the real boss is.

Controls:

arrow keys + WASD : camera
mouse for everything else
Credits :

VPJ : Programming LuisMint : 3d art
Freshbone : Sprites + UI
BlookMook : Other
